^(allowMissing)$.description:
If set to true, and the config is not found, a new config will be created.
 In this situation, `update_mask` is ignored.

^(reviewConfig)$.description: The name field is used to identify the SQL review config to update.
^(reviewConfig)$.title: The SQL review config to update.

^(updateMask)$.description: The list of fields to update.

allow_missing.description:
If set to true, and the config is not found, a new config will be created.
 In this situation, `update_mask` is ignored.

review_config.description: The name field is used to identify the SQL review config to update.
review_config.title: The SQL review config to update.

update_mask.description: The list of fields to update.
